abstract: Polish former priest Wojciech Gil is sentenced to seven years in prison for sexually abusing eight children in Poland and the Dominican Republic.
lead_paragraph: The former priest, Wojciech Gil, was charged with sexually abusing eight children in Poland and the Dominican Republic.

headline.main: Polish Ex-Priest Sentenced to 7 Years on Abuse Charges
headline.print_headline: Europe; Poland: Ex-Priest Is Sentenced to Prison

snippet: The former priest, Wojciech Gil, was charged with sexually abusing eight children in Poland and the Dominican Republic.
